sticky-image-description: Get the top news from across Pennsylvania, plus some fun and a puzzle, all in one free daily email newsletter.
support-text: I hope you appreciated this article. Before you move on, I was hoping you would consider supporting Spotlight PA's journalism in what will be a pivotal year for Pennsylvania. This article and all of our journalism are available to you at no cost thanks to our supporters. We don't believe vital investigative and public-service journalism should be hidden behind a paywall or only for those who can afford a subscription fee. Everyone deserves access to the facts. Especially in tighter economic times, people should not be forced to choose between the essentials, and essential news. That's why we need your help. Your support enables us to continue to produce tough, unique reporting you won't find anywhere else. And it also enables us to share that work with more than 100 newsroom partners in your community and communities across the state at no charge. From giant corporations to predatory hedge funds, a small number of billionaire owners have a powerful hold on so much of the information that reaches the public about what’s happening here. Spotlight PA is different. We have no billionaire owner or shareholders to consider. Our journalism is produced to serve the public interest – not profit motives. Our readers keep us independent, beholden to no outside influence, and accessible to everyone – whether they can afford to pay for news, or not. Will you do your part today by making a contribution? Join thousands of your friends and neighbors by stepping up and letting us know you value quality, nonpartisan journalism that gets results for Pennsylvania. Make a gift now. With gratitude, Christopher Baxter Editor in Chief PS: If you prefer to mail a check, you can send it to: Spotlight PA, PO Box 11728, Harrisburg, PA 17108-1728
takeover-dek: Hurry a gift in support of trusted, nonpartisan journalism before our DOUBLE match expires at 11:59 p.m. tonight! Can we count on you now?
takeover-hed: Only 12 hours left to support Spotlight PA
topper-image-description: Support Spotlight PA's nonprofit, nonpartisan journalism for Pennsylvania.
